examples: Sour cherry compote is the perfect topping for pancakes or waffles.
I added mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers as toppings on my pizza.
I used slices of bully beef as a topping for my homemade pizza.
I always use mascarpone cheese as a light and creamy topping.
You can create delicious linguine dishes with your favorite toppings.
words.defineEn: a layer of food that is spread over the top of a dish to make it taste or look better
words.defineVi: một lớp thức ăn được trải lên trên cùng của một món ăn để làm cho nó ngon hơn hoặc trông đẹp mắt hơn
